item.title: Crazy nested for loops (i.e. a Beautiful Mind)
item.author: jkat98@gmail.com (Jason Krol)
item.description: I was working on a project today, that dealt with a large amount of JSON data. The project needed to allow the user to filter the data by a bunch of different filters and options within those filters. Initially I started using Underscore.js thinking this would help, but in the interest of time (had to get it done today!!!!) I decided to just do it quick and dirty. Well, I succeeded in the dirty department:
